alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Marathon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 6:19PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Thunderstorms are likely in portions of western Lincoln and western Marathon Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 618 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ogema to near Medford to 7 miles southwest of Colby. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Spencer around 635 PM CDT. New Wood Wildlife Area around 700 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Edgar, Rozellville, Cherokee, Little Chicago, Stratford, March Rapids, Hamburg, Poniatowski, Athens and Rib Falls. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
